Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 87th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing with significant delays at 87th due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red  Line trains are standing near 87th due to fire department activity. At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Shuttle buses have been requested  from 95th to Garfield to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
